name: @markandrus/effect-derive
description: Derive Covariant (Functor) instances for algebraic data types (ADTs)

scripts.generate:listCovariant: node --experimental-strip-types src/index.ts Covariant --for-type List --discriminator type --in-file src/List.d.ts --out-file src/listCovariant.ts
scripts.generate:nonEmptyListCovariant: node --experimental-strip-types src/index.ts Covariant --for-type NonEmptyList --in-file src/NonEmptyList.d.ts --out-file src/nonEmptyListCovariant.ts
scripts.generate:roseTreeCovariant: node --experimental-strip-types src/index.ts Covariant --for-type RoseTree --in-file src/RoseTree.d.ts --out-file src/roseTreeCovariant.ts
